text: ymptoms include kidney abnormalities, mild to profound sensorineural and/or conductive hearing loss, heart defects, and genital malformations. These features vary among affected individuals - even among those within the same family. Intellectual disability or learning problems have also been reported in about 10 percent of people with Townes-Brocks syndrome.
